pr_title: REST endpoints for batch operations on Faceted search classifications

timeline.message:
Add REST endpoints to support creating, updating and deleting multiple
Faceted search classifications.

Add tests for the new endpoints.

timeline.bodyText: With this being added, do we need to update the previous batch methods to also use this?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: Because Search filters use UUID as their IDs, the previous batch methods do not call this apply when constructing an instance of ApiBatchOperationResponse. They use the default one provided by case class.
replies.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText:
Excellent. Good to go.
Strange that package-lock.json needs updating. 🤔 But if so....
replies.author: edalex-ian
